data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Sultan Kudarat, Philippines.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sultan Kudarat, Philippines

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Sultan Kudarat, Philippines.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Sultan Kudarat, Philippines to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 113,124 believers in the state of Sultan Kudarat the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jew, Tagalog-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 113,124 believers living in the state of Sultan Kudarat. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sultan Kudarat, Philippines. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, fill the 113,124 believers in the state of Sultan Kudarat with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

location.name: Sultan Kudarat
location.people_groups_list: Maranao, Sama, Southern, Hanunoo, Molbog, Sama Bangingi, Northern Sama
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Maranao (1,383,000), Sama, Southern (249,000), Hanunoo (23,000), Molbog (24,000), Sama Bangingi, Northern Sama (99,000)
